channel.title: CVE Feed for Skoda Auto -- Skoda Connect
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Skoda Auto -- Skoda Connect

item.title: CVE-2023-28901|2024-01-18T16:27:43.711Z -- skoda%20auto -- skoda%20connect
item.description: The Skoda Automotive cloud contains a Broken Access Control vulnerability, allowing remote attackers to obtain recent trip data, vehicle mileage, fuel consumption, average and maximum speed, and other information of Skoda Connect service users by specifying an arbitrary vehicle VIN number.
